snippet: Chinese officials, bending to public pressure, have announced an investigation into the death of dissident Li Wangyang, whose body was found hanging from a hospital window this month.
abstract: Chinese officials, bending to public pressure, will investigate the death of dissident Li Wangyang, whose body was found hanging from a hospital window.

byline.contributor: Shi Da and Jacob Fromer contributed research.

lead_paragraph: Chinese officials, bending to public pressure, have announced an investigation into the death of dissident Li Wangyang, whose body was found hanging from a hospital window this month.

headline.seo: China to Investigate Death of Labor Activist
headline.main: China to Investigate Death of Labor Activist
headline.print_headline: China: Activist’s Death to Be Examined
